Reviews.Author: Brad J Rivelli
Reviews.Content: Got this for my 83yr old Mother who has nothing but negative to say about anything new. She has taken to it like a baby duck to water...

Reviews.Title: Alcatel
Reviews.Author: TampaChicky
Reviews.Content: This is perfect for My Mom , she needed a new phone with bigger buttons this gets the job done , easy to operate.

Reviews.Title: YAY!!
Reviews.Author: nakia joiner
Reviews.Content: This is a gift for my daughter who just turned 13, she needed something simple and I feel she will be calling and texting in no time, without becoming furstrated.

Reviews.Title: A great tracfone
Reviews.Author: Thomas G. Reiter
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use, the battery lasts longer that I expected.  I would recommend this to other seniors like myself, the "smart LG tracfone was terrible.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Faye
Reviews.Content: Easy to use as a travel phone.  Good screen, large numbers, letters. Not all fancy, but provides what is needed.

Reviews.Title: Great quality for all ages
Reviews.Author: YSB
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice phone for the money and is ideal for your elderly parents. Large buttons with nice basic features provides reliable service. The phone came with a nice stand.

Reviews.Title: Easy as pie!
Reviews.Author: duff
Reviews.Content: I like this phone.  I was going to buy it from Amazon but they wanted like 45bux for it and I know I saw it other places for half that.  So, I found a place that had it for $29 and just for the heck of it I sent them an electronic mail blurb and gave them the url of the other place and wouldn't you know it?  Amazon dropped their price to $29, so I grabbed it and got the free 2 day shipping.  Kind of a no-brainer!  :)

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: It is a great phone. It's easy to see, it is easy to configure and it comes loaded with ringtones! Absolutely a great buy! IT has an FM radio tuner and flashlight. It also comes with a car charger and charging stand. Definitely buy it. The call quality is perfect. I might just get a second one for myself as the first one was for a relative.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone - portability problem
Reviews.Author: L. Schad "lschad"
Reviews.Content: The phone itself looks great. However, I have been waiting for a week to port the number. Their 800 number did not help me.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Retiree Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: RetiredNurse "BirdingTeacher"
Reviews.Content: Perfect solution for emergency phone in car by second driver. For a total of about $100 per year, one can have access to 911 or other emergency numbers even when primary phone holder is not in car.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone nice display big push buttons
Reviews.Author: Tj
Reviews.Content: Very nice cell phone numbers are big enough to see easily and the reception is very clear. Only minor complaint is the ringer is over complicated to set but once you do it no problem perhaps more detailed instructions would have been nice. Also display is very bright and easy to see, All in all very satisfied with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Alcatel Phone is Great
Reviews.Author: Sharon Keel
Reviews.Content: Received this item much earlier than expected and everything that was listed on the front of the box was there and the instruction were very concise as to how to start the use of the phone.  It did not let me down.  I love knowing how many minutes and time I have left viewed on the screen to let me know when to add more minutes to my phone.  I only needed it to have available for emergencies and it fits the bill.  Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Very nice phone
Reviews.Author: Kevin1
Reviews.Content: Got this phone for my mom to use while on vacation or out the home. Phone works great! Thank you very much

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Rebecca A. Kropog
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone for my mother who has a hard time seeing the numbers on other phones.  This phone is exactly what I was looking for.  She has no problems seeing the numbers and operating this phone.  It is also very simple to use.

Reviews.Title: Great little Phone for the $$$
Reviews.Author: K. WILSON
Reviews.Content: The phone is easy to use, large numbers so easy to see.  It's very basic so if you want all the bells and whistles this isn't for you, but for an emergency or casual use phone it can't be beat.  Add minutes as you want or  buy the 1 yr. card and it's under $10/month to use.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for me
Reviews.Author: John F. Duffek
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent phone for someone who only wants to make and receive telephone calls. I could even have done without the fm radio and flashlight.

Reviews.Title: nice deal!
Reviews.Author: Ralph Gleason
Reviews.Content: I love it real nice big numbers with out all the complicated whistels and bells. would not think twice in buying ANOTHER

Reviews.Title: Fine
Reviews.Author: Dave Cicero
Reviews.Content: I got this for my mother who needed bigger buttons. It's ok for her except it's still a little more complicated than I was hoping. It's a fine product though.

Reviews.Title: The right choice for me!
Reviews.Author: Phyllis E. Tucker
Reviews.Content: I have not had this phone for long but so far I am pleased with it. Believe it or not, we have no cell phone service where I live and I do not live in the boonies!! A few hundred feet up the road from where I live there is full service. With that being said you can understand why I only use a cell phone in my car. That is why I chose a prepaid. I like that this phone has large numbers and holds a charge very well. It is very clear when talking. The double minutes were activated without any problems. I will update this review after using it more.

Reviews.Title: Why Pay More?
Reviews.Author: hugh parker
Reviews.Content: You can get this phone at retail outlets anywhere in the US, but it will cost more.  The main advantages to this particular phone are that the keys are big and the sound is amplified.  These qualities are good for seniors, like my parents, who do not see or hear well.  The phone does not have all the features my children would want, however.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: JoAnneFreeman
Reviews.Content: Numbers are easy to see and use, good value and especially like the double minutes, would recommend to anyone, coverage still great

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: KB   USA
Reviews.Content: I like it alot. Wish the online manual was better but I figured out all that I need to use this phone. Great for those of us who don't see or hear well.

Reviews.Title: Big buttons
Reviews.Author: Christopher Eliades
Reviews.Content: This is a basic cell phone. Its chief asset is the large buttons which is handy for people with vision problems.

Reviews.Title: Rating the Alcatel tracfore
Reviews.Author: Janice Gerlits
Reviews.Content: I use it very little, only when I'm out of my apartment. I got it as a safeguard.I want it for emergencies, like the flat tire I got last week. To get the spare on  & get to a repair shop.They were helpful when I need info on getting it activated, & functioning correctly.I had Verizon & only used 5-10 min. a month, too costly. This meets my needs, & not as expensive.I like the larger keys. I don't need all the bells & whistles of a smart phone.

Reviews.Title: 72 yr old likes it a lot.
Reviews.Author: wyly c. parsons
Reviews.Content: does what is required: i can can dial the big buttons, press "boost" or "speaker" to hear better, and no internet or picture taking to confuse.

Reviews.Title: Perfect landline phone replacement
Reviews.Author: Edward T. Batchelor
Reviews.Content: Exactly as advertised. Closest possible to a landline phone replacement.My phone number and minutes transferred flawlesly from my older smaller Tracfoneand I couldn't be more pleased. Plus delivery was prompt.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for elderly and/or disabled
Reviews.Author: Terry
Reviews.Content: I got this for my dad after he had a stroke. His previous phone was a flip phone with small buttons that he can no longer use or even open easily. This works perfectly for him- a basic bar style phone with big buttons.

Reviews.Title: I like it, well designed and function
Reviews.Author: Y. cheng "peter"
Reviews.Content: nothing fancy, just works very well, even with FM reception signal is very strong. It comes with a car charger with a USB line. It eliminates my MP3 player which ia always in my pocket when running outside. Solid 5 stars

Reviews.Title: Great little Prepaid Phone!
Reviews.Author: B. Martiny
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 82 year old dad who is very hard of hearing. I wanted him to have something for travel emergencies that had text capabilities that he could manage easily. This phone is it. Easy to use, inexpensive and the numbers and display is easy to read. Great choice for a basic phone with no bells and whistles, nothing to confuse or discourage a non techie.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for Seniors who Do Not Want All the Bells and Whistles
Reviews.Author: A. Mentor
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and big buttons that I can see. Does everything I need. Highly recommend. You will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Lousy reception in my area of VT
Reviews.Author: Peregrine
Reviews.Content: I have been using Tracfones as emergency phones for some years, and always been reasonably pleased.  I am NOT pleased with this one, purchased from Amazon.  It never gives clear reception, only a buzz.  I did check with Tracfone regarding service for this phone model in my area of NW Vermont before purchasing, and they told me -- wrongly -- that the phone was suitable.  T'aint.

Reviews.Title: Battery is working, but phone screen is dead
Reviews.Author: alotudo "alotudo"
Reviews.Content: Only two months of minimal usage and the phone is dead. I can't get the screen to light up so I can get to the sim and serial number to transfer the minutes. Blah. Not happy with this phone at all.

Reviews.Title: dissatified
Reviews.Author: victoria lynn
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my 87 year old uncle in case of emergency as he lives alone it will not work at his home.  I have a tracfone myself and it works great at his house I don't understand this

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed
Reviews.Author: crafty lady
Reviews.Content: There is no need for contracts, or monthly fees.  This fulfilled all my requirements for the use I will give it.

Reviews.Title: Just what we needed.
Reviews.Author: Raxx
Reviews.Content: Thisis a simple phone with nice big numbers, but overall not big or bulky. Just what we were looking for. Very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Serves the need
Reviews.Author: The gifted person
Reviews.Content: This is a nice size cell phone.  The large buttons are great, no more squinting to see the numbers!  There are two things that could be improved upon -- the ringer is weak and there should be a way to unlock the phone permanently. It auto locks the keypad and I feel that should be a user controlled item.

Reviews.Title: Great for us
Reviews.Author: JKJ
Reviews.Content: This phone seems to have a reputation as being designed for old folks, so maybe that's why we like it.  Very simple and straightforward to use, large keys, an easy to read screen, and a very handy button for increasing/decreasing volume while talking.  The biggest shortcoming regarding this product is one that other reviewers have noted, which is that it comes with no instructions.  That's not a show-stopper though, because you can call Tracfone (as we did) to resolve any problems arising out of the sometimes overly brief online instructions (problems that people more experienced than we in the use of mobile phones probably wouldn't have).

Reviews.Title: Can't unlock
Reviews.Author: shomirb "shomirb"
Reviews.Content: Great phone.  Tracfone will not agree to unlock.  Can't use it thanks to the Librarian of Congress who is now apparently able to dictate laws like the Caeser-in-chief.

Reviews.Title: Phone would be ok if Tracfone had good service
Reviews.Author: Stoneycreekgirl
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone and liked the large buttons and screen, but Tracfone service is horrible. There is a reason that the BBB and various complaint sites have so many bad reviews for Tracfone. Their customer service is terrible. They cannot get the phone activated - their site does not activate the phone, and we suspect that we may have been sold a phone that will not even work in our area. Think twice about it.

Reviews.Title: frustration
Reviews.Author: marge tisue
Reviews.Content: I am returning this phone because it was defective. customer service at tracfone kept telling me it was activated when clearly it wasn't the home screen indicted activation required when phone was turned on. After two calls an 90min of speaking with representatives and never being able to activate the phone have decided to stay with my LG and return this phone, very frustrated with the whole situation!

Reviews.Title: Can't unlock it.
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: Can't unlock it. It is my phone I should be able to do with it whatever I desire, not TARCFONE.

Reviews.Title: Teriffic phone
Reviews.Author: Willie
Reviews.Content: If you want and excellent phone to talk and text  and you like a large and lighted key pad then you will love this phone.

Reviews.Title: No Bluetooth
Reviews.Author: RayDon
Reviews.Content: I replaced my LG800 with this phone.  Works great but it would be super if it had Bluetooth to work with my Ford Sync.  I use the Sync when going into an unfamiliar area for appointments etc.  Other than that it is worth the money.I have the original packaging and nowhere does it say that it has Bluetooth, but it doesn't say it doesn't either.

Reviews.Title: easy
Reviews.Author: Christine Salek
Reviews.Content: I got this for my husband for his birthday. He would not own a cell phone but needed one in case of emergency.It is easy to use and he is glad he has it.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: J. Barker
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone for my hubby and in less than a year we purchased a new one and the reason was because the phone kept deleting all the contacts.  Hopefully it's replacement, another "Big Easy" with flip cover won't do that. I don't know if it was because there wasn't a cover for the original Big Easy or just a defect in the phone but it was a nuisance to have to keep adding contacts to the phone.

Reviews.Title: A perfect phone for an old fart or an idiot
Reviews.Author: Glenn Vadney
Reviews.Content: Easy to read numbers..easy to use features...No camera..You can disable text...It's a phone to make calls with..It's not a smart phone, actually it's quite a stupid phone and that's why I love it... It doesn't get any better than this...Well the ring tones do suck...I would prefer a ring ring phone sound and not a tinkly tootley noise ....

Reviews.Title: Dont waste your money
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I got this phone for the big numbers for my husband. It drops calls all the time.  At the best of times he may only have 2 bars, he will talk and walk into next room and call is over. Someone calls him he answers it and call is dropped. We have 2 other trac phones in house and we have no problem with them.

Reviews.Title: Not what I Expected
Reviews.Author: EasyToPlease "EasyToPlease"
Reviews.Content: The only thing I like about this phone is that the numbers are BIG to see and read.  The flashlight is great.  The speaker phone is the only way I could hear it,  and that was barely. The normal volume sound....hard to hear clearly.  Had no Camera,  I thought all phones came with camera's theses days, I was very disappointed.  Would NOT recommend for Senior Folks at all because of the sound quality.  No caller ID either,  which I thought it had. The caller ID was the number,  not the name.  Would not buy again.

Reviews.Title: Too small for my small hands
Reviews.Author: Beverly Robinson
Reviews.Content: This phone is too small, the icons were difficult for me to see. I like bigger fonts, I had to use my bifocals to use this phone

Reviews.Title: Wife got it working again. I am a cell clutz.
Reviews.Author: DENNIS OLEARY "glass eye"
Reviews.Content: Wife got it working again. OK for my level of use. I am a cell clutz, and don't care to go beyond that level. I am 73 and glad these weren't around to disrupt the free flow of my peaceful mental revelry in my younger years.First Review:Bought for March trip to Hawaii. Made about 5 calls total. Now May, 2 months later and Battery Kaput, won't take a charge.Cheap phone - in every way.  Seemed OK when it worked.

Reviews.Title: Bad service, deactivates phone.
Reviews.Author: Jarrett Oliver
Reviews.Content: I was a tracfone for 8 years.  Never had problems until now. Recently the service they provide is garbage.  Other companies are possibly hacking into their services.  Their own managers and analyzers do not know what going on.  Any phone that you hook up with them with randomly be deactivated and you'll spend hours being on hold to get it hooked back up.  It happened every day for 2 weeks.  Many others are having the same problem.  Do not purchase tracfone!!!!!!!  Think about it, I myself just lost three job interviews cause I can't get my number back.  This can happen to you!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: They screwed me over
Reviews.Author: Charles J. Pellerin
Reviews.Content: I have been without power, gas, or water for weeks in the Colorado floods. When they overcharged my VISA card, they refused to do anything because "I should have called sooner!" Unbelievable!

Reviews.Title: Good value and its practical.
Reviews.Author: slim29bob
Reviews.Content: After reading the user reviews I decided that this phone meets my basic requirements forcommunicating on the road and around town.  I have not actually placed the unit in serviceas I am waiting for my cell number to port.

Reviews.Title: Whoops!
Reviews.Author: Sue
Reviews.Content: Needed a new phone compatable with Tracphone and liked the reviews I saw on te Alcatel 382G.  Didn't read the description carefully, I guess, because the feature I wanted - easy texting - was not there.  Next time I'll read more carefully.

Reviews.Title: A382 or 382G or A382G
Reviews.Author: Albert Zierak Sr.
Reviews.Content: I dont know why they use so many different model numbers on that phone UNLESS when you see that we will not be undersold price match has something to do with it.But why can all the markets (wal-mart,lowes,target,homedepot just to name a few)Get away with doing it.its the same on washers refridges dishwashers tractors and so on.
